title: Throne of Bone
description:
Rise, Necromancer! The world left you for dead , but death was never the end. Awaken once more, summon your undead legions, and reclaim your throne in a turn-based strategy game that fuses roguelike tactics with autobattler mayhem. FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
The bones of the fallen are yours to shape. Draft from over 50 unique minions, each with strengths to exploit and weaknesses to mend. Experiment with synergies , adapt your strategy, and let your forces march to war. Mortality is but a trivial concern.
Victory earns you skulls, the currency of conquest, so spend them wisely. Between battles, retreat to your castle and embrace the true work of necromancy. Perform dark rituals , train your minions, and unravel the mysteries of your ancestral keep.
Your minions may fight on their own, but your power reaches beyond the grave. Unleash spells mid-battle to shift the odds. Bolster your undead to weaken your foes. A well-timed spell can mean the difference between victory and another trip to the grave .
The strategic depth of drafting -roguelikes combines with streamlined experience of an autobattler. Each run offers new choices, new threats, and new opportunities to perfect the art of undeath . The path to power is paved with bones will they be yours or your enemies ’?
